<video preload="metadata" poster="data/img/poster.jpg" src="data/media/test.mp4" width="100%" height="auto" autoplay controls loop muted>

  <track kind="subtitles" src="data/media/subtitles.vtt" srclang="en" label="English" default/>
  Video tag not supported
</video>
